description:
✂  Tools & Supplies I Recommend: https://goo.gl/Y7KKhY
$  Join the "Fellowship" on Patreon: https://goo.gl/ZZ4vBf

This episode I do a speed build based on a random selection of projects as suggested by viewers on facebook. 

This arched stone bridge turned out pretty great considering the time constraints and lack of planning. 

BUY a PROXXON HOTWIRE CUTTER:

USA - http://amzn.to/2lVNvEM 
Canada - http://amzn.to/2pWazXF

"PAVEMENT" ROLLING PIN BY GREENSTUFFWORLD.COM

USE PROMO CODE FOR %5 DISCOUNT on your Green Stuff World order: “BMCWINTER2019” (expires 31/03/2019)

PURCHASE THE GRASS TUFTS HERE:

USA

Spring (4mm): http://amzn.to/2D3pHZR
Autumn (4mm): http://amzn.to/2CJ1WIP
Dead (6mm): http://amzn.to/2D2rXAu
More Options: http://amzn.to/2qynRgZ
